title: [Large-Scale] Corporate HRD Online Community e-Learning Completion Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online learning platform navigation and understanding of HRD (Human Resource Development) fundamentals
context.additional_context: Customized strategy development through workplace learning environment analysis, enhancing self-directed learning capabilities in BYOD settings

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more factors influencing e-learning completion rates within an organization using mixed research methods (interviews and surveys).
Learners can design team-based e-learning completion strategies using PBL and develop one prototype applicable in practice.
Learners can identify determinants of completion rates at individual/organizational/learning-process levels and propose data-driven improvements.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
